title: Order object
description: Template container for Order, still to be populated

$schema.description: $schema only included to aid validation of JSON, should not be used in real calls.

AccountId.title: Account ID
AccountId.description: The ID of the account that identifies the advertiser and buyer that own the order.

Brand.title: Brand
Brand.description: A descriptive name for the brand being advertised.

AdvertiserBrandId.title: Advertiser Brand ID
AdvertiserBrandId.description: The id of the AdvertiserBrand being advertised

Budget.title: Budget
Budget.description: The order’s estimated budget. The budget is directional; it is not used to limit the amount of money that the order spends. To determine the projected spend based on quantity, aggregate the Cost property for each line of the order.

Name.title: Order Name
Name.description: The order's display name. The name must be unique.
